episode.title: I Don’t Know How to Read
episode.rawTitle: 315: ‘I Don’t Know How to Read’, With Joanna Stern
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Special guest: the one and only Joanna Stern. Topics: new iMacs, Touch ID vs. Face ID, remote controls, surveillance advertising, and people who want to make everything a video call when a good old-fashioned voice call would do.
episode.showNotes:
Special guest: the one and only Joanna Stern. Topics: new iMacs, Touch ID vs. Face ID, remote controls, surveillance advertising, and people who want to make everything a video call when a good old-fashioned voice call would do.
